Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory583.jpg'}
{3: 'Haicma wishes she could play the never-ending game of questions with Nanami once again as they did in that small room.'}
{3: 'But she also knows that this Nanami is no longer the Nanami from the past... and Haicma herself is not who she once was either.'}
{3: 'Now, Haicma is the Church of Machina\'s "Hermit"... and Nanami is the ultimate purpose they seek.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami understands all your fears and confusions because just like you... I've also seen the worst endings between machines and humans in countless futures.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Whether or not your mission here succeeds today, machines and humans might still destroy each other under the threat of the Punishing Virus...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haicma', 3: "If that's the case... what is the purpose of everything you've done?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami skips down from Power and lands on the ground, tilting her head to ponder.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "You're not wrong... perhaps nothing Nanami does means anything in the future. But some people still do their best, believing that the future can be changed one step at a time.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Looking at the blue planet that seems to be within reach, Nanami smiles tenderly.'}

{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'The humans that everyone thinks are weak are still fighting on Earth against endless despair with nothing but a trace of hope. Nanami will look so lame if she keeps running away!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami will try her best and do what she can... as a friend of humans and a sage of the awakened machines.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I'm going to lead the machines to the future I've chosen, the future where machines and humans can love each other.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Looking at Nanami's face, Haicma truly feels Nanami's growth for the first time..."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2701_17.jpg'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Wait! Nanami can also draw the things she saw and show you!'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I'll bring them with me and show you if there's a next time."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory301.png'}
{3: "You don't need to draw me pictures anymore. I've walked past those sights you've seen. The traces of you have guided me all along."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2701_04.jpg'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '...How about Nanami calls you "Haicma" from now on?'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Haicma!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory304.png'}
{3: 'This name, this gift you gave me, is something I have and will always treasure.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2701_04.jpg'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Whoa... This is the first time I've had such a clear dream! Who are you?"}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory584.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "Even though you don't know me anymore, those memories have not faded a bit."}
{3: 'All her doubts and confusions crumble in an instant. Haicma finally understands why she has been resisting the "correct" future.'}
{3: 'It is because that is not the future she wants. She wants Nanami to make a different choice. She wants the future to look different.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}

{2: '???', 3: "Nanami is what the experiment wanted to achieve—a machine's love is freed from the shackles of programming. Kindness and affection from humans have paved a path to the future for machines."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory583.jpg'}
{3: 'But who is she to shackle Nanami once again? All the things she wanted to say plunge back into the dark pond.'}
{3: 'Nanami is still the girl Haicma remembers, but she is also the Sagemachina every machine follows.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Sage, I will stay by your side no matter what you choose... always.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2701_07.jpg'}
{3: 'Nanami smiles, extending a hand toward Haicma.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'In that case, nice to meet you, Haicma... and Lazer!'}
{2: 'Trailblazer', 3: 'Huh...? Am I Lazer...?'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'You... remember my name?'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Yep! You're Nanami's friend, Haicma!"}
{3: "Even though Nanami's memories of Haicma from the past have been erased, Nanami remembers her from the future when they became friends."}
{3: 'Perhaps it is a coincidence, a bug in the infinite calculations—but Nanami and Haicma will always become friends regardless of which future comes true.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "Right... Haicma... is Nanami's friend."}
{3: "Haicma clutches Nanami's hand. This is her first promise to herself—but one of her infinite identical promises in the infinite timelines: she will always become Nanami's friend."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory330.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: '...And so, Nanami has decided to begin the real journey!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Martin', 3: 'You have said that before...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'This is different!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Someone told Nanami something very important. Now, I'm going to search for that treasure!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl hides her hands behind her back as if keeping a devious secret, but her eyes glisten with resolve.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "But to make that dream come true, we're going to need everybody.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami is going to find more companions and gather everyone together.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Because there are many more friends waiting for me.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Martin', 3: 'You are not making something up just so you can disappear and have fun somewhere else, are you?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Of course not!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami is not leaving any friends behind this time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Martin, Rohacchi, Haicma, Lazer...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '...And all the lost children. Nanami will bring them home.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rohacchi', 3: 'Location data. From Nanami. Confirmed.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Then... let's go, my new adventure party!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The many incomplete graffiti gather here, and together they form one complete picture.'}
